list.name: Subset CONUS and run ParFlow
list.description: Subsets data from the CONUS1 modeling domain stored on Hydrodata as well as climate forcing to perform a simulation with ParFlow-CLM, that is ParFlow fully coupled to the climate model.

list.name: Subset CONUS and do a ParFlow Spinup
list.description: Subsets all static inputs from a CONUS1 run stored in Hydrodata and performs a spinup simulation (without forcing)

list.name: Subset CONUS and do a ParFlow Spinup
list.description: Subsets all static inputs from a CONUS1 run stored in Hydrodata and performs a spinup simulation (without forcing)

list.name: Access and cite point observations data
list.description: Walk through some example functionality for accessing and citing point observations.

list.name: Explore point data availability
list.description: Walk through how to explore what data is available.

list.name: Plotting returned point data
list.description: Walk through some examples for how to plot data returned from get_point_data.

list.name: Filter sites by USGS HUC boundaries
list.description: Walk through of how to download a HUC boundary shapefile from the USGS and filter observations to only sites within that HUC.

list.name: Filter sites by pre-defined site networks
list.description: Walk through how to filter point observations data to only sites within pre-defined networks such as GAGES-II or CAMELS.

list.name: Save and wrangle point observations data
list.description: Explore some basic features of pandas DataFrames.

list.name: Subset CONUS and run ParFlow
list.description: Subsets data from the CONUS1 modeling domain stored on Hydrodata as well as climate forcing to perform a simulation with ParFlow-CLM, that is ParFlow fully coupled to the climate model.

list.name: Subset CONUS and do a ParFlow Spinup
list.description: Subsets all static inputs from a CONUS1 run stored in Hydrodata and performs a spinup simulation (without forcing)

list.name: Subset CONUS and do a ParFlow Spinup
list.description: Subsets all static inputs from a CONUS1 run stored in Hydrodata and performs a spinup simulation (without forcing)
